Name: Wooden shabti
Description: A very fine, painted wooden shabti. The main body is painted white, the face and hands are red. The eyes are quite startling, realistically painted in black and white. The figure wears a long tripartite wig with decoration on the tips, and a collar with a yellow background. The shabti carries two small hoes and on the back is a small red and yellow basket along with a yoke and two waterpots. The text is in a single vertical column, black with a yellow background within a red border.
